message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what others might charge. Considering its value, I propose a price of $100 for you to experience all it has to offer. I'm confident this price will provide you with excellent value while ensuring a fair return for us. Looking forward to your consideration.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you acknowledging the value of the product. However, my budget for this is a bit lower. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. Let me know if that works for you.
